GameSubmitCodeRequest.description: Request to link a submission to a game. This is the correct type for game submissions (not to be confused with SubmitCodeRequest for direct code submission)

submissionId.description: The ID of the submission to link to the game

GameSubmitCodeRequest.title: GameSubmitCodeRequest

404.description: Puzzle or parent comment not found

delete.description: Deletes a puzzle. Only available to puzzle author or admins.

get.description: Returns a single puzzle by ID (public view, no solution details).

patch.description: Updates an existing puzzle. Only available to puzzle author or admins.

get.description: Returns paginated puzzles matching the legacy Fastify `/puzzle` listing response.
